suncertify.server
Interface RemoteDatabaseFactory

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RemoteDatabaseFactoryImpl
public interface RemoteDatabaseFactory
extends java.rmi.Remote

The remote interface for obtaining the remote object reference. Uses Factory pattern to let the subclass to implement the method that is needed.

Method Summary
 RemoteDatabase getClient()
          Called to obtain reference (stub) to the remote object, RemoteDatabase

                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                java.io.FileNotFoundException

RemoteDatabase reference (stub) to the remote object
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - if registry could not be contacted
java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the specified file cannot be found
